svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="830" width="650" x="125" y="-180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-14" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontStyle=1" value="クライアントコード中のクエリ (Fragmentの利用あり)" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="30" width="470" x="150" y="-20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-15" parent="1" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.document;fontSize=18;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="600" width="480" x="150" y="10" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-16" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;fontColor=#000000;" value="<div style="line-height: 200%;">import { gql } from "@apollo/client";</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">const QUERY = gql`</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	query GetItems {</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getItemById {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>...ItemFields.id</b></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getRecommendItem {</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;"><b>...ItemFields[name]</b></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">}</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b>fragment ItemFields on Item {</b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	name</span><br></b></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	price</span><br></b></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><b><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</b></span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">`;</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="590.5" width="340" x="180" y="19.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="3y2dNiOmcEcrZG0tFU__-28" parent="1" rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 468px; height: 1px; padding-top: 175px; margin-left: 27px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: クライアントコード中のクエリ (Fragmentの利用あり)

switch.text: クライアントコード中のクエリ (Fragmentの利用あり)

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

を指定して取得することはできない
